001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Mediator;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.EstimationFunction;
007
008/**
009 * Default implementation of the {@link Trainer} interface.
010 *
011 * <p>
012 * {@code TrainerImpl} wires together an {@link Initializer},
013 * {@link ObjectiveFunction}, {@link Optimizer}, and {@link Regime}
014 * to execute a full training process for an {@link EstimationFunction}.
015 * </p>
016 *
017 * <p>
018 * This class is typically not instantiated directly; instead, clients
019 * are encouraged to use the factory method
020 * {@link Trainer#of(Initializer, ObjectiveFunction, Optimizer, Regime)},
021 * which constructs and configures an instance of {@code TrainerImpl}.
022 * </p>
023 *
024 * <p>
025 * The {@link #train(EstimationFunction, DataSet)} method follows the
026 * canonical training sequence:
027 * </p>
028 * <ol>
029 *   <li>Initialize the estimation function using the configured
030 *       {@link Initializer}.</li>
031 *   <li>Apply the configured {@link Regime}, which in turn uses the
032 *       {@link ObjectiveFunction} and {@link Optimizer} to guide and
033 *       update the estimation function during training.</li>
034 * </ol>
035 *
036 * @param <E> the type of {@link EstimationFunction} being trained
037 * @see Trainer
038 * @see Initializer
039 * @see ObjectiveFunction
040 * @see Optimizer
041 * @see Regime
042 */
043@Mediator
044@Strategy(Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
045public class TrainerImpl<E extends EstimationFunction> implements Trainer<E> {
046
047    private Initializer<? super E> initializer;
048    private ObjectiveFunction objective;
049    private Optimizer<? super E> optimizer;
050    private Regime regime;
051
052    /**
053     * {@inheritDoc}
054     */
055    @Override
056    public Initializer<? super E> getInitializer() {
057        return initializer;
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * {@inheritDoc}
062     */
063    @Override
064    public void setInitializer(Initializer<? super E> initializer) {
065        this.initializer = initializer;
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * {@inheritDoc}
070     */
071    @Override
072    public ObjectiveFunction getObjective() {
073        return objective;
074    }
075
076    /**
077     * {@inheritDoc}
078     */
079    @Override
080    public void setObjective(ObjectiveFunction objective) {
081        this.objective = objective;
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * {@inheritDoc}
086     */
087    @Override
088    public Optimizer<? super E> getOptimizer() {
089        return optimizer;
090    }
091
092    /**
093     * {@inheritDoc}
094     */
095    @Override
096    public void setOptimizer(Optimizer<? super E> optimizer) {
097        this.optimizer = optimizer;
098    }
099
100    /**
101     * {@inheritDoc}
102     */
103    @Override
104    public Regime getRegime() {
105        return regime;
106    }
107
108    /**
109     * {@inheritDoc}
110     */
111    @Override
112    public void setRegime(Regime regime) {
113        this.regime = regime;
114    }
115
116    /**
117     * {@inheritDoc}
118     */
119    @Override
120    public void train(E estimationFunction, DataSet trainingSet) {
121        if (optimizer == null) {
122            throw new IllegalStateException("No optimizer defined!");
123        }
124        if (regime == null) {
125            throw new IllegalStateException("No regime defined!");
126        }
127        if (initializer != null) {
128            initializer.initialize(estimationFunction);
129        }
130        regime.train(estimationFunction, trainingSet, objective, optimizer);
131    }
132}
